original: 幽州涿郡人，蜀漢宗室，劉禪之子。蜀亡後隨劉禪移居洛陽。太子劉璿死於鍾會叛亂，本該被立為嗣子，但因劉禪寵愛劉恂，不顧反對，改立劉恂為嗣。
text: Youzhou Zhuojun, Shuhan clan, son of Liu Chan. After the death of Shu, he moved to Luoyang with Liu Chan. The prince Liu Ying died in the Zhonghui rebellion and was supposed to be the heir, but because Liu Chan loved Liu Xun, regardless of opposition, he changed Liu Xun to the heir.
